title: The Bridge MULTi17-PROPHET
description:
The Bridge  (c) The Quantum Astrophysicists Guild

release date ...: October 2767
protection .....: Steam
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/RU/PT/NL/TR/HU/
                  RO/JP/CN/KR/TH/AR

The Bridge is a 2D logic puzzle  game  that  forces
you to reevaluate your  preconceptions  of  physics
and perspective. It is Isaac  Newton  meets  M.  C.
Escher. Manipulate gravity to redefine the  ceiling
as the floor  while  venturing  through  impossible
architectures.   Explore   increasingly   difficult
worlds, each  uniquely  detailed  and  designed  to
leave you with a pronounced sense  of  intellectual
accomplishment. The Bridge exemplifies games as  an
art form, with beautifully hand-drawn  art  in  the
style of a black-and-white lithograph.

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!
